name: TriJam71
description:
This is my Entry for the TriJam71. A Game Jam where you have to create a Game in only 3 Hours.

The Theme was "Lasers".

This is the first time I managed to create the game in under 3 Hours! In exactly 2:58!

Surprisingly I even had time to record a simple guitar track and some sound effects :-)

How to Play:

Use [left] and [right] to move the space ship. Use [space] to shoot a laser beam

(the laser needs a little bit of cooldown before you can shoot again).

Dev Time Lapse:
